local_intent: Primary translation push on the T-block: ensure visibility and alignment, confirm yaw=90, then push 0.1m toward 180 degrees and verify tracking.
assumptions: Brief re-alignment before push is sufficient; object remains visible after motion.
coherence_with_global: Matches the first push in GLOBAL_BT after alignment and yaw set; respects perceive→align→act→verify and uses same parameters (distance 0.1, direction 180, timeout 1200, yaw 90).
